component.name: OpenVPN3 GUI
component.summary: Modern OpenVPN 3 Linux GUI with live stats, tray, and notifications

description.p: OpenVPN3 GUI is a modern, user-friendly graphical interface for OpenVPN 3 Linux. It features live connection statistics, a decluttered network graph, session management, a system tray icon, desktop notifications, and a comprehensive log viewer. Designed for seamless integration with the COSMIC desktop and AppStream, it provides a polished VPN experience for Linux users.
Initial release with full OpenVPN 3 Linux integration, live stats, tray icon, notifications, and AppStream support.
